name: Prototype Unfinished 3D Platformer
description:
This is an early prototype of an ongoing project. All that is included in this content is an unfinished controllable character.

This character can glide, sprint, jump, move and place bombs that do not yet explode.

This project is simply uploaded to demonstrate my ability to work with Unity3D for a portfolio.

Controls:

WASD -- Move

Shift -- Sprint

Space (when grounded) -- Jump

Space (when in the air) -- Glide

Left Click -- Place Bomb

(variable jump is included)
